name: I Really Dont Want to Learn Forbidden Spells
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhua
content: I admit, when it comes to time travel, there must be some sort of cheat code. But seriously, which newbie mage only knows dark curses like &quotforbidden spells&quot? I&#039m human, not a dark lord! Oh well, I guess forbidden spells are pretty cool after all! Original Manhua
